elementSpec.desc: contains bibliographic elements describing an item (e.g. an article or poem) published within a monograph or journal and not as an independent publication.
contiene elementos bibliográficos que describen un ítem (por ejemplo un artículo o poema) publicado dentro de una monografía o publicación periódica y no como publicación independiente.

remarks.p: May contain titles and statements of responsibility (author, editor, or other), in any order.
The analytic element may only occur only within a biblStruct, where its use is mandatory for the description of an analytic level bibliographic item.
